newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-RBA says tolerates exchange rate movements.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-RBA says tolerates exchange rate movements.

text.p: Reserve Bank of Australia Governor Ian Macfalarne on Thursday said the central bank tolerated substantial movements in the Australian dollar exchange rate.

"As long as you are on track in the long run we don't think you have to make an immediate knee-jerk reaction to the fact that a short-lived movement in the exchange rate is causing your inflation rate to do something you do not want it to do," Macfarlane said.
